languages.text: "То, что некомпетентность служб, надзирающих за состоянием крематория, спасла нам жизнь, не делает их небрежность менее вопиющей. Я подам жалобу".

traits.locale_text: "То, что некомпетентность служб, надзирающих за состоянием крематория, спасла нам жизнь, не делает их небрежность менее вопиющей. Я подам жалобу".

languages.text: "The fact that the incompetence of the crematorium's maintenance staff saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."
languages.original_text: "То, что некомпетентность служб, надзирающих за состоянием крематория, спасла нам жизнь, не делает их небрежность менее вопиющей. Я подам жалобу".

traits.locale_text: "The fact that the incompetence of the services maintaining the crematorium has saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."
"The fact that the incompetence of the services maintaining the crematorium has saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."
"The fact that the incompetence of the crematorium's maintenance staff saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."
"The fact that the incompetence of the crematorium's maintenance staff saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."
"The fact that the incompetence of the crematorium's maintenance staff saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."

languages.text: “幸亏火葬场那些检修人员都是无能的废物，我们才捡回了一条命。但这并不意味着我会对他们的疏漏视而不见。我要准备进行投诉。”
languages.original_text: "The fact that the incompetence of the crematorium's maintenance staff saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."

traits.locale_text: “幸亏火葬场那些检修人员都是无能的废物，我们才捡回了一条命。但这并不意味着我会对他们的疏漏视而不见。我要准备进行投诉。”

languages.text: «El hecho de que la incompetencia del personal de mantenimiento del crematorio nos haya salvado la vida no reduce su magnitud. Presentaré una queja».
languages.original_text: "The fact that the incompetence of the crematorium's maintenance staff saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."

traits.locale_text: «El hecho de que la incompetencia del personal de mantenimiento del crematorio nos haya salvado la vida no reduce su magnitud. Presentaré una queja».

languages.text: 「火葬場のメンテナンス担当者の無能さにより自分たちの命が救われたからといって、その過失が悪質であることには変わりありません。苦情を入れておきます」
languages.original_text: "The fact that the incompetence of the crematorium's maintenance staff saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."

traits.locale_text: 「火葬場のメンテナンス担当者の無能さにより自分たちの命が救われたからといって、その過失が悪質であることには変わりありません。苦情を入れておきます」

languages.text: "Dass die Inkompetenz der Wartungsarbeiter des Krematoriums uns das Leben gerettet hat, macht ihre Nachlässigkeit nicht besser. Ich werde eine Beschwerde einreichen."
languages.original_text: "The fact that the incompetence of the crematorium's maintenance staff saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."

traits.locale_text: "Dass die Inkompetenz der Wartungsarbeiter des Krematoriums uns das Leben gerettet hat, macht ihre Nachlässigkeit nicht besser. Ich werde eine Beschwerde einreichen."

languages.text: « Même si l'incompétence du personnel de maintenance du crématorium nous a sauvé la vie, leur négligence n'en est pas moins parfaitement scandaleuse. Je compte bien déposer une plainte. »
languages.original_text: "The fact that the incompetence of the crematorium's maintenance staff saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."

traits.locale_text: « Même si l'incompétence du personnel de maintenance du crématorium nous a sauvé la vie, leur négligence n'en est pas moins parfaitement scandaleuse. Je compte bien déposer une plainte. »

languages.text: "Krematoryum bakım personelinin beceriksizliği hayatımızı kurtarmış olabilir ama bu durum, ihmalkârlıklarını hafifletmez. Şikâyet kaydı açacağım."
languages.original_text: "The fact that the incompetence of the crematorium's maintenance staff saved our lives does not make their negligence any less egregious. I will register a complaint."

traits.locale_text: "Krematoryum bakım personelinin beceriksizliği hayatımızı kurtarmış olabilir ama bu durum, ihmalkârlıklarını göz ardı edilebilir bir hâle getirmiyor. Şikâyette bulunacağım."
